name: git
description: Reliable access to the Git command-line client for repository operations.

custom.default: Use --tool_args -- to forward raw git flags exactly as they should appear after the base command.

subcommand.name: status
subcommand.description: Show the working tree status and staged changes. Automatically runs synchronously when worktree is small.

options.name: branch
options.description: Show the branch and tracking info even in short format.

positional_args.name: pathspec
positional_args.description: Restrict status output to the provided pathspec.

subcommand.name: add
subcommand.description: Add file contents to the index for the next commit. Runs asynchronously, returns an operation_id immediately, and pushes results when complete so you can continue other tasks.

options.name: all
options.description: Stage all tracked and untracked files.

options.name: patch
options.description: Interactively choose hunks of patch between the index and the working tree.

positional_args.name: pathspec
positional_args.description: Files or directories to add to the index.

subcommand.name: commit
subcommand.description: Record changes to the repository with support for multi-line commit messages via temporary files when required. Runs asynchronously, returns an operation_id immediately, notifies when complete, and you should continue with other work instead of waiting.

options.name: message
options.description: Commit message content. Multi-line messages are written to a temp file and passed with -F.

options.name: all
options.description: Automatically stage files that have been modified and deleted.

options.name: amend
options.description: Amend the tip of the current branch.

subcommand.name: push
subcommand.description: Update remote refs along with associated objects. Runs asynchronously, returns an operation_id immediately, and completion is pushed via notification so do not wait idly.

options.name: set-upstream
options.description: Set upstream for the given branch after push.

options.name: force
options.description: Force push even if it results in non-fast-forward updates.

subcommand.name: log
subcommand.description: Show commit logs with common formatting options. Runs asynchronously, returns an operation_id immediately, and will notify you on completion so continue working while it processes.

options.name: oneline
options.description: Condense each commit to a single line.

options.name: decorate
options.description: Print out ref names of any commits that are shown.

options.name: graph
options.description: Display branch and merge history graphically alongside the output.

positional_args.name: rev_range
positional_args.description: Commit range or revisions to include in the log output.
